meanings.definition: (古代ローマの度量衡で) 7/12の、7/12の重さの
meanings.english_definition: (of ancient Roman weights and measures) equal to seven twelfths of a unit.

examples.sentence: A septuncial as was seven-twelfths of a pound.
examples.translation: セプンキウスのアス貨は1ポンドの7/12の重さだった。

readability_explanation.text: This is a highly specialized term related to ancient Roman weights and measures. It is unlikely to be encountered outside of historical or numismatic contexts.
